thread.title: Kevin Trinh (Lucky)
thread.title_full: Ascendtech, Inc. reviewed by Kevin Trinh (Lucky)

author: Kevin Trinh (Lucky)
title: Kevin Trinh (Lucky)
text: I love the product I received from them. I've bought from various other sellers but they haven't provided me service like Ascendtech. Quick and responsive to my emails. I even returned a product once and that went smoothly. I would love to buy from them again anytime!!
